answers.answer: I packed at 37 weeks I'm 38 now and wish this baby would hurry up!
I am 4 hours from my c section and I packed last night it's hard to pack being huge I say 35 weeks

question: Hey girls I have 74 days until my due date, but I have diabetes and may have bub in 60 days. This is my first baby, when should I pack mine and my baby's bag? Was there anything someone forgot to pack which would of made it easy for them? As in pillow, extra clothes, extra nappies ect. Thanks heaps
title: when should i pack my bag??
